functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Verse 1: \\nOur town is lively,\\nnever a bore, \\nFishing and farming,\\nwe adore, \\nThe sun is shining, the\\nsky so blue, \\nBut danger lurks, we\\nfear its true.\\n\\nChorus: \\nWe love our life, its\\nsimple and pure, \\nBut fear creeps in, we"}', '{"text":"cant ignore, \\nWell fight for what we\\nhold dear, \\nOur village strong, we\\nwont disappear.\\n\\nVerse 2: \\nBuilding our homes,\\nblock by block, \\nSharing our goods,\\nlike a clock, \\nA sense of community,\\nthats what we strive, \\nBut shadows loom, and"}', '{"text":"we cant survive.\\n\\nChorus: \\nWe love our life, its\\nsimple and pure, \\nBut fear creeps in, we\\ncant ignore, \\nWell fight for what we\\nhold dear, \\nOur village strong, we\\nwont disappear.\\n\\nVerse 3: \\nSitting by the fire,"}', '{"text":"warmth so bright, \\nSinging and dancing,\\nall through the night, \\nThe stars twinkle, a\\npeaceful sight, \\nBut danger\\napproaches, with all\\nits might.\\n\\nChorus: \\nWe love our life, its\\nsimple and pure, \\nBut fear creeps in, we\\ncant ignore, \\n"}', '{"text":"Well fight for what we\\nhold dear, \\nOur village strong, we\\nwont disappear.\\n\\nBridge: \\nWell band together,\\nour courage strong, \\nFight with all our might,\\nuntil the break of\\ndawn, \\nWell never give up\\nwell never back down, \\nOur village will stand,"}', '{"text":"with pride and renown.\\n\\nChorus: \\nWe love our life, its\\nsimple and pure, \\nBut fear creeps in, we\\ncant ignore, \\nWell fight for what we\\nhold dear, \\nOur village strong, we\\nwont disappear."}'],title:"Silverkeep Town Song",author:"Silverkeep Town Meetup",resolved:"1b",generation:1}
